name: PositiveMindset
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Positive Mindset is meant to become part of your daily routine. It's an integral part of your flash briefing that leaves you with the feeling that you can accomplish whatever you set out to. 

Positive Mindset uses the best tactics for keeping a healthy mental state and allows you to stay optimistic or change from a negative mindset to a positive one.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
